content.rendered:
Component Repair and Overhaul - Avionics

FAA/EASA Part 145 Repair Station for Class 1, 2, and 3 accessories:

  • ACAS Processors
  • ADF System Components
  • Cockpit Voice Recorders
  • DME System Components
  • Flight Data Recorders
  • ILS System Components
  • Radio Altimeters
  • TCAS Processors
  • Transponders
  • UHF System Components
  • VHF System Components
  • VOR System Components
  • Wiring Harnesses

Avionics Test Cells – IRIS 2000 and Flight Data Recorders - Rose

  • SDX 2000 - Mode S Transponders
  • RGS 2000 NG - TCAS
  • NAV 2000 - All Transponders
  • Voice Recorders
